localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Infracost is an open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests. When you change your infrastructure code (Terraform), we post a comment in the pull request, telling you the impact to your cloud bill, e.g. “this will increase your bill by 25% next month”.
blogPost.body: Infracost is an open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests. When you change your infrastructure code (Terraform), we post a comment in the pull request, telling you the impact to your cloud bill, e.g. “this will increase your bill by 25% next month”.
blogPost.title: Infracost - Open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Infracost是一个开源的云成本估算器，在拉取请求中。当你更改基础设施代码（Terraform）时，我们会在拉取请求中发布一条评论，告诉你对云计算账单的影响，例如 "这将使你下个月的账单增加25%"。
localize.tagline: 拉请求中的开源云成本估算器

localize.description: Infracost是一個開源的雲成本估算器，在拉取請求中。當你更改基礎設施代碼（Terraform）時，我們會在拉取請求中發佈一條評論，告訴你對雲計算賬單的影響，例如 "這將使你下個月的賬單增加25%"。
localize.tagline: 拉請求中的開源雲成本估算器

previous.title: RT @Breaking911: A New York public school principal sent a letter to white parents advocating for “white abolition” and urging students to…

localize.full_text: RT @Breaking911: 纽约一所公立学校的校长给白人家长发了一封信 倡导 "废除白人 "并敦促学生... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text:
纽约一所公立学校校长给白人家长发信，鼓吹 "废白"，敦促学生成为种族的 "叛徒"。

学校员工被迫参加谴责白种人 "家长制 "和 "权力囤积 "的演讲--NYP https://t.co/paLXxgbhen

localize.full_text: RT @Breaking911: 紐約一所公立學校的校長給白人家長髮了一封信 倡導 "廢除白人 "並敦促學生... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text:
紐約一所公立學校校長給白人家長髮信，鼓吹 "廢白"，敦促學生成爲種族的 "叛徒"。

學校員工被迫參加譴責白種人 "家長制 "和 "權力囤積 "的演講--NYP https://t.co/paLXxgbhen

next.excerpt: Auth. is a 2FA and OTP management tool for everyone. Works with all Apple personal devices - support handoff and keychain. Scan the QR Code and Done! Or you may add your account manually from your provider. Safari extension is also available for auto-fill-in.
next.title: auth. - 2FA , MFA, OTP, Secure Code for Apple devices

localize.description: Auth.是一款适合所有人使用的2FA和OTP管理工具。适用于所有苹果个人设备--支持交接和钥匙扣。扫描二维码就可以了! 或者你可以从你的供应商手动添加你的帐户。Safari扩展也可用于自动填写。
Auth.是一款適合所有人使用的2FA和OTP管理工具。適用於所有蘋果個人設備--支持交接和鑰匙扣。掃描二維碼就可以了! 或者你可以從你的供應商手動添加你的帳戶。Safari擴展也可用於自動填寫。
